explains: adv. 热心地，满腔热情地

sentences.cn: 这则通告受到了热烈的欢迎。

sentences.en: On the contrary, they turn to pursue enthusiastically a supposedly more modern culture.
sentences.cn: 相反，他们转而热情地追求一种据说更为现代的文化。

sentences.en: The fans cheer enthusiastically for their favorite players and teams, who respond by playing better than before.
sentences.cn: 球迷们热情地为他们喜爱的球员和球队欢呼，而对方的回应是比以前打得更好。
